branchCategory.name: Standard Guided Cylinder - MGP

branchItem.name: MGPM-Z, Standard Guided Cylinder, Slide Bearing
MGPL-Z, Standard Guided Cylinder, Ball Bushing Bearing
MGPMF-Z, Standard Guided Cylinder with Flange, Slide Bearing
MGPLF-Z, Standard Guided Cylinder with Flange, Ball Bushing Bearing
MGP-AZ, Standard Guided Cylinder with Air Cushion
MGPM-Z, Standard Guided Cylinder, Slide Bearing, Temperature Resistant
branchItem.description: <p>The MGPM High Temperature Option is a compact body actuator integrated with internal guide shafts to isolate the load bearing from the movement of the actuator's rod and seals. The carbon steel alloy slide bearing provides lateral stability protecting it from side load impacts, suitable for stopping applications.</p>
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <li>Double acting, guided actuator <li>High temperature(XB6)Bore sizes(mm): 12, 16, 20, 25, 32, 40, 50, 63, 80, 100 <li>Slide bearing type <li>Standard stroke range (mm): 10 to 400 <li>Port threads: M (12 to 25 bore), Rc, NPT or G (32 to 100 bore) <li>High temperature option (XB6) ambient range -10 to 150°</li>

branchItem.name: MGP-Z, Standard Guided Cylinder, Stroke Options
branchItem.description: <p>The MGPM/L-XC8 is an adjustable extend stroke type where the MGPM/L-XC9 allows for stroke adjustment on the retract stroke. The MGPM/L-XB13 is a compact body actuator integrated with internal guide shafts with the ability to operate smoothly at low speeds (5 to 50mm/s).</p>

branchItem.name: MGP-Z, Standard Guided Cylinder, Environmental Options
branchItem.description: <p>Series MGP with environmental options is designed for tougher applications and still utilizes an ultra-compact design as the standard MGP actuator.</p>

branchItem.name: MGP-Z, Standard Guided Cylinder, Port Options
branchItem.description: <p> Series MGP with port options can help in tight mounting applications and still utilizes an ultra-compact design as the standard MGP actuator </p>

branchItem.name: MGP-Z, Standard Guided Cylinder, Mounting Options
branchItem.description: <p>Series MGP mounting options can help in tight mounting applications and still utilizes and ultra-compact design as the standard MGP.</p>
